description: “We’re gonna make a mess, we’re gonna make a lot of noise…it’s gonna be fun!” Jakob had it all planned out, and our eager newbie bottom followed suit. Kit was excited to get started, so he proceeded to suck Jakob off at the pool the second it was exposed. Clearly, he wanted it badly, so Jakob gave it to him exactly how he wanted it…after all, Kit’s moans expressed it all!
title: Jakob & Kit: Bareback
